subject: Internship Selection and Interview Invitation
body:
Dear Vishal,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the *Software
Development Intern* position at *TechNova Solutions*. Congratulations on
making it to this stage!

We would like to invite you for an interview to further discuss your
qualifications and potential fit for the role. Please find the interview
details below:

*Date:* 2025-04-08
*Time:* 10:30 AM IST
*Mode:* Google Meet
*Link:* [Insert meeting link]

Kindly confirm your availability for the scheduled time. If you are
unavailable, please suggest an alternative time at your earliest
convenience.

We look forward to speaking with you.

Best regards,
*Priya Sharma*
HR Manager
TechNova Solutions
priya.sharma@technova.com
+91-9876543210
